long_description: The Amphipod AirFlow Microstretch waistpack sports a comfortable, breathable and bounce-free design and carries all of your small essentials for training, races and trail runs. AirFlow(TM) hybrid mesh technology wicks away moisture and circulates air between your back and the pack. Internal divider in the zippered compartment is removable for added capacity. Fully adjustable belt offers a comfortable fit.
short_description: The Amphipod AirFlow Microstretch waistpack sports a comfortable, breathable and bounce-free design and carries all of your small essentials for training, races and trail runs.
